name: stockily
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
used when describing someone's body that is fairly short, and wide across the shoulders and chest: a stockily-built man He was stockily good-looking. See
stocky
More examplesFewer examplesHe was stockily built with short, tight curly hair.He's surprisingly small, but stockily powerful.
